title: In flux
creator_contributor_role: Hector Waldron Pride Charitable Trust, partner
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Melbourne Legacy
abstract: Joining Legacy at an early age, Ryan tells of the important friendships that have supported him.
description: When Ryan joined Legacy, he was six years old and fatherless. Legacy taught him about acceptance and gave him three close friends. He tells of his relationship with Bec, Bear and Brad and how they have been there for him and have recently helped him in his decision to become a Legacy leader.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001776; Living Legacy : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2009
